name: Superhero - life simulator of the superhero with RPG elements. Become the greatest hero of the Earth
name_original: Superhero - life simulator of the superhero with RPG elements. Become the greatest hero of the Earth
description:
Experience the life of a real superhero – work your way up from an ordinary person to the greatest superhero of the universe.

DO BRAVE DEEDS
Cure drunkards at the proctologist’s or force democracy.

GO TO WORK
You can clip sheep or work at the factory.

BEAT SUPEREVILDOERS
Valeron, the homeless, and Ebola-Man are up-and-doing.

RUN A BUSINESS
Create a social net for superheroes or set up superhero’s pension fund.

OTHER FEATURES:
- Each step is a day. Every day you can do one thing
- Don’t let your hero die from diseases, hunger or depression
- Get an education, buy hero’s munitions and discover super abilities
- Hire assistants to earn all the necessary resources
- Get birthday presents every year
- Become immortal and print yourself on the memory for centuries

Become a superhero right now!
